content.thinking:
Looking at the log, last message was at 17:00:56 (5:00 PM). Current time is 18:00 (6:00 PM), so that's about 1 hour since last activity.

Looking at suggestions file, I can see there are many pending suggestions. Let me count how many have status "pending". I'll need to parse through but I can see lots of suggestions with "status": "pending".

Since it's been more than 30 minutes AND we're in active hours (08:00-23:00), I should:
1. Generate a wake-up image
2. Send a wake-up message with the image

The instructions say to generate an image with a subject related to the wake-up theme. Since the group has been quiet for an hour, I'll use a theme about an empty/abandoned arena.

content.text: The group has been quiet for about an hour (last message at 17:00). Time to wake them up with a challenge!

arguments.command: ./scripts/generate-group-image.sh --subject "Dusty abandoned gaming arena with robot sitting alone on throne made of keyboards, dramatic spotlights cutting through darkness, 'WHERE ARE THE CHALLENGERS?' graffiti on walls, tumbleweeds and cobwebs" --context wakeup --aspect 1:1
